author: Dailymail.Com Reporter
title: Amber Rose flaunts famous curves for Hollywood night out | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share Amber, who recently broke up with boyfriend Val Chmerkovskiy, maintained her signature look with her bleached hair cropped tightly against her scalp. She wore subtle makeup, opting to play up with eyes with dark eye shadow and lots of mascara to really make them pop. Keeping it simple: Amber, who recently broke up with boyfriend Val Chmerkovskiy, maintained her signature look with her bleached hair cropped tightly against her scalp Independent woman: Amber seemingly drove herself to the celeb hot spot and was seen getting out of her white Rolls Royce She was joined inside by Golden State Warriors star Kevin Durant who kept a low profile as he exited the popular club. Amber seemingly drove herself to the celeb hot spot and was seen getting out of her white Rolls Royce. The reality star recently reunited with her ex Wiz Khalifa to throw a star-studded birthday party Sunday for their son Sebastian that drew Blac Chyna and Lamar Odom. Naturally pretty: She wore subtle makeup, opting to play up with eyes with dark eye shadow and lots of mascara to really make them pop Before his big game: Golden State Warriors star Kevin Durant who kept a low profile as he exited the popular club, but joined the aspiring DJ inside The backyard birthday bash for four-year-old Sebastian featured a DJ booth, a speech from the birthday boy, a magic show and a three-layer birthday cake. Amber and Wiz started dating in 2011 and got in engaged in March 2012 and married in July 2013 after welcoming Sebastian in February 2013. They divorced in 2014 with Amber citing irreconcilable differences and they have joint custody of Sebastian. Still a family: The reality star recently reunited with her ex Wiz Khalifa to throw a star-studded birthday party Sunday for their son Sebastian
